headline: POTTERY BARN KIDS AND POTTERY BARN TEEN LAUNCH COLLABORATION WITH STONEY CLOVER LANE
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, January 08, 2026--Pottery Barn Kids and Pottery Barn Teen, portfolio brands of Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE: WSM), the world’s largest digital-first, design-led and sustainable home retailer, announced today a new collaboration with Stoney Clover Lane, the iconic accessories brand known for its vibrant aesthetic and playful customizations. For the debut collection, the design teams at Pottery Barn Kids and Pottery Barn Teen collaborated closely with founders Kendall and Libby Glaze

content.title: POTTERY BARN KIDS AND POTTERY BARN TEEN LAUNCH COLLABORATION WITH STONEY CLOVER LANE
content.summary: SAN FRANCISCO, January 08, 2026--Pottery Barn Kids and Pottery Barn Teen, portfolio brands of Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE: WSM), the world’s largest digital-first, design-led and sustainable home retailer, announced today a new collaboration with Stoney Clover Lane, the iconic accessories brand known for its vibrant aesthetic and playful customizations. For the debut collection, the design teams at Pottery Barn Kids and Pottery Barn Teen collaborated closely with founders Kendall and Libby Glaze
